org.bigNumber.common.models

Class Big

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bigNumber.Big
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Big>

    public final class Big
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Big>
    This class makes Big type number object
    Since:
    August 7, 2013, v0.1.0
    Author:
    Alok Shukla
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setValue

        public void setValue(java.lang.String value)
              throws IncompatibleCharacterException
        • No character accept '0' to '9', '.' and '-' is allowed.
        • No two '.' are allowed.
        • Spaces (' ' or " ") in the provided String are removed before setting the value so no problem with spaces.
        • '-' is allowed only as first character
        Parameters:
        value -
        Throws:
        IncompatibleCharacterException
